conbody.p: You can set bookmarksbookmarks on the master track for easy access to certain playback positions.

Use the Set button to set up to 9 bookmarks per file. Each bookmark will be set at the current playback position. A new bookmark will get the first available number and the corresponding number button will become available. Press that button to instantly jump the playback to the bookmark position. Press Remove button, followed by a number button to remove the bookmark.
conbody.note: Please note that only those number buttons that correspond to set up bookmarks are enabled in the player.
conbody.p: You can also assign a name to a bookmark. Press Ctrl on your keyboard and click on the bookmark number button to enter the name.
Hover the mouse pointer over a bookmark number button and the bookmark position and name will be displayed in a floating panel.
